languages.text: {n}Эмелина Лихтенхарт со свистом втягивает воздух.{/n} "Гипотеза. Вольный Торговец. Вероятно, тот самый, к которому Ксавьер проявлял столь повышенный интерес. Фон Валанциус, регион к галактическому северу от Фурибундуса, династия замечена в еретических настроениях, уровень угрозы..."

{n}Emelina Lichtenhart inhales through her teeth.{/n} "Hypothesis. Rogue Trader. Most likely the same one Xavier took such an unusual interest in. Von Valancius. Territory to the galactic north of Furibundus. A dynasty noted for its heretical tendencies. Threat level—"
languages.original_text: {n}Эмелина Лихтенхарт со свистом втягивает воздух.{/n} "Гипотеза. Вольный Торговец. Вероятно, тот самый, к которому Ксавьер проявлял столь повышенный интерес. Фон Валанциус, регион к галактическому северу от Фурибундуса, династия замечена в еретических настроениях, уровень угрозы..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart draws a breath, making a whistling sound.{/n} "Hypothesis. Rogue Trader. Most likely, the Rogue Trader Xavier has taken such an unusual interest in. Von Valancius. Territory to the galactic north of Furibundus. A dynasty noted for its heretical tendencies. Threat level—"

{n}Emelina Lichtenhart inhales through her teeth.{/n} "Hypothesis. Rogue Trader. Most likely the same one Xavier took such an unusual interest in. Von Valancius. Territory to the galactic north of Furibundus. A dynasty noted for its heretical tendencies. Threat level—"

languages.text: {n}艾米莉娜·莱肯哈特咬着牙，吸了口气。{/n}“假设，行商浪人，这是最有可能的假设。希维尔对行商浪人有着非同寻常的兴趣。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，其领地位于怒焰星北部。此王朝以异端倾向著称。威胁等级——”
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart inhales through her teeth.{/n} "Hypothesis. Rogue Trader. Most likely the same one Xavier took such an unusual interest in. Von Valancius. Territory to the galactic north of Furibundus. A dynasty noted for its heretical tendencies. Threat level—"

traits.locale_text: {n}艾米莉娜·莱肯哈特咬着牙，吸了口气。{/n}“假设，行商浪人，这是最有可能的假设。希维尔对行商浪人有着非同寻常的兴趣。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，其领地位于怒焰星北部。此王朝以异端倾向著称。威胁等级——”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart inspira entre dientes.{/n} «Hipótesis: Comerciante Independiente. Probablemente, {mf|el mismo|la misma} por quien que Xavier ha mostrado un interés inusual. Von Valancius. Territorio en el norte galáctico de Furibundus. Una dinastía destacada por sus tendencias heréticas. Nivel de amenaza...».
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart inhales through her teeth.{/n} "Hypothesis. Rogue Trader. Most likely the same one Xavier took such an unusual interest in. Von Valancius. Territory to the galactic north of Furibundus. A dynasty noted for its heretical tendencies. Threat level—"

Von Valancius. Territorio en el norte galáctico de Furibundus. Una dinastía destacada por sus tendencias heréticas. Nivel de amenaza...».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}エメリナ・リヒテンハルトは息を吸い込み、ヒューヒューと口笛のような音を出す。{/n}「仮説。自由開拓者。恐らく、自由開拓者ザビエルがフォン・ヴァランシウスに異常な興味を示している。フリブンダスの銀河系西の領土。異端的な傾向で知られる王朝。脅威レベル―」
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart draws a breath, making a whistling sound.{/n} "Hypothesis. Rogue Trader. Most likely, the Rogue Trader Xavier has taken such an unusual interest in. Von Valancius. Territory to the galactic west of Furibundus. A dynasty noted for its heretical tendencies. Threat level—"

traits.locale_text: {n}エメリナ・リヒテンハルトは息を吸い込み、ヒューヒューと口笛のような音を出す。{/n}「仮説。自由開拓者。恐らく、自由開拓者ザビエルがフォン・ヴァランシウスに異常な興味を示している。フリブンダスの銀河系西の領土。異端的な傾向で知られる王朝。脅威レベル―」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart prend une inspiration, les dents serrées.{/n} « Hypothèse. Libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}. Très probablement {mf|celui|celle} qui a tant intéressé Xavier. Von Valancius. Un territoire au nord galactique de Furibundus. Une dynastie aux tendances hérétiques notables. Niveau de menace... »
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart inhales through her teeth.{/n} "Hypothesis. Rogue Trader. Most likely the same one Xavier took such an unusual interest in. Von Valancius. Territory to the galactic north of Furibundus. A dynasty noted for its heretical tendencies. Threat level—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart prend une inspiration, les dents serrées.{/n} « Hypothèse. Libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}. Très probablement {mf|celui|celle} qui a tant intéressé Xavier. Von Valancius. Un territoire au nord galactique de Furibundus. Une dynastie aux tendances hérétiques notables. Niveau de menace... »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart atmet scharf durch ihre Zähne ein.{/n} "Hypothese. {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wahrscheinlich {mf|derselbe, an dem|dieselbe, an der} Xavier ein so ungewöhnliches Interesse hat. Von Valancius. Territorium im galaktischen Norden von Furibundus. Eine für ihre ketzerischen Tendenzen bekannte Dynastie. Bedrohungsstufe ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart inhales through her teeth.{/n} "Hypothesis. Rogue Trader. Most likely the same one Xavier took such an unusual interest in. Von Valancius. Territory to the galactic north of Furibundus. A dynasty noted for its heretical tendencies. Threat level—"

Eine für ihre ketzerischen Tendenzen bekannte Dynastie. Bedrohungsstufe ..."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart, dişlerinin arasından soluyor.{/n} "Hipotez. Hür Tacir. Büyük ihtimalle Xavier'in olağan dışı ilgi duyduğu. Von Valancius. Furibundus galaktik kuzey bölgesi. Kâfirce eğilimleriyle bilinen bir hanedanlık. Tehdit seviyesi..."
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart inhales through her teeth.{/n} "Hypothesis. Rogue Trader. Most likely the same one Xavier took such an unusual interest in. Von Valancius. Territory to the galactic north of Furibundus. A dynasty noted for its heretical tendencies. Threat level—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart, dişlerinin arasından soluyor.{/n} "Hipotez. Hür Tacir. Büyük ihtimalle Xavier'in olağan dışı ilgi duyduğu. Von Valancius. Furibundus galaktik kuzey bölgesi. Kâfirce eğilimleriyle bilinen bir hanedanlık. Tehdit seviyesi..."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
